text:
<!everyone> happy friday folks!
---
reminder that at 1pm ET / 10am PT today we're doing an AMA with ConvertKit's content team: <@U02GURRRZE0> and <@U02H58CTZ41>!!!
• we'll be talking about storytelling, lead gen, marketing to creators, podcasts & video, and much more. <https://www.addevent.com/event/Tw9873905|add this to your calendar here if you want a reminder when it starts>.
• and if you want to see convertkit in action, check out this demo from <@U02GURRRZE0> → _*<https://superpath.co/blog/convertkit-for-content-marketers-and-freelance-writers-a-quick-start-guide|ConvertKit for Content Marketers and Freelance Writers: A Quick-Start Guide>*_
---
okay, jobs!
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Aha Media Group is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202376-content-strategist-aha-media-group|Content Strategist> (:star:️ new this week)
• Crowd Content is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202439-content-manager-crowd-content|Content Manager> (:star:️ new this week)
• Goldcast is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/200824-content-marketing-lead-goldcast|Content Marketing Lead> (:star:️ new this week, :wave: <@U02LE204RSQ>)
• Shopify is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/200126-senior-writer-content-marketing-shopify|Senior Writer, Content Marketing> (:star:️ new this week)
• Oyster is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172422-product-marketing-manager-oyster|Editorial Director> (incl. video w/ Q&A Kevan Lee)
• Kibo Commerce is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186833-content-marketing-manager-kibo-commerce|Content Marketing Manager> (incl. video w/ <@U02HFUK4BDL>)
• Crayon is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196250-director-of-content-marketing-crayon|Director of Content Marketing>
• Chili Piper is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/197258-content-marketing-manager-chili-piper|Content Marketing Manager>
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190944-content-team-lead-animalz|Content Team Lead>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19184-technical-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Technical Content Marketing Manager>
• <http://Spreadsheet.com|Spreadsheet.com> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188552-head-of-content-spreadsheetcom|Head of Content>
• Knoetic is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190006-senior-marketing-manager-knoetic|(Senior) Marketing Manager>
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>
• Confetti is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186720-growth-marketing-manager-confetti|Growth Marketing Manager>
• Three Ventures is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/185894-senior-paid-search-manager-three-ventures|Senior Paid Search Manager>
• Hyper is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/185469-storyteller-content-lead-hyper|Storyteller, Content Lead>
• The Stoke Group is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186759-senior-content-strategist-and-writer-the-stoke-group|Senior Content Strategist & Writer>
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Fixture Media is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199436-freelance-writers-healthcare-welding-videophotography-grillingsmoking-fixture-media|Freelance Writers (Healthcare, Welding, Video/Photography, Grilling/Smoking)> (:star:️ new this week)
• Content Harmony is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/198594-freelance-content-strategist-content-briefs-content-harmony|Freelance Content Strategist (Content Briefs)>  (:star:️ new this week, :wave: <@U019E2RJD9Q>)
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196806-freelance-writer-remote-campfire-labs|Freelance Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
• Chatty is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194585-freelance-content-editor-chatty|Freelance Content Editor>
• ZipMessage is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/187372-content-creator-and-strategist-zipmessage|Content Creator & Strategist>
• Campaign Monitor is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/184558-freelance-content-writer-campaign-monitor|Freelance Content Writer>
• Exponent is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/179312-freelance-content-writer-exponent|Freelance Content Writer>
• Fitt Insider is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173103-social-and-newsletter-writer-fitt-insider|Social & Newsletter Writer>
• Clearbit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/163608-freelance-writer-editor-clearbit|Freelance writer / editor> (:wave: <@UJ2MPBP7V>)
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• CloudApp is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202629-head-of-marketing-cloudapp|Head of Marketing> (:star:️ new this week)
• Megawatt is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202037-b2b-tech-account-manager-and-strategist-megawatt|B2B Tech Account Manager and Strategist> (:star:️ new this week)
• Leapsome is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199596-social-media-and-community-marketing-manager-leapsome|Social Media & Community Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/199593-pr-and-communications-manager-leapsome|PR & Communications Manager>
• Sprout Social is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173105-content-strategist-sprout-social|Content Specialist> (:wave: <@URB31QKM4>)
• <http://Wordpress.com|Wordpress.com> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194377-developer-content-marketing-editor-wordpresscom|Developer Content Marketing Editor> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/194376-content-marketing-editor-wordpresscom|Content Marketing Editor> (:wave: <@U02875QT4BC>)
• Zapier is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/193443-content-marketing-manager-audience-growth-zapier|Content Marketing Manager - Audience Growth>
• Shorthand is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/193154-senior-manager-of-demand-generation-shorthand|Senior Manager of Demand Generation>
• FreeWill is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190909-digital-content-and-marketing-specialist-freewill|Digital Content & Marketing Specialist>
• Automox is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188870-content-writereditor-automox|Content Writer/Editor>
• Brunner is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/181823-content-marketing-lead-brunner|Content Marketing Lead>
• Lexer is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/180249-content-marketing-manager-lexer|Content Marketing Manager>
• Thinkific is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173174-content-marketing-strategist-thinkific|Content Marketing Strategist>
• Siege Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172425-content-marketing-manager-siege-media|Content Marketing Manager>
• Monte Carlo is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/164801-head-of-product-marketing-monte-carlo|Head of Product Marketing>
• On The Map, Inc. is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161228-seo-director-on-the-map-inc|SEO Director>
• Miro is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/154672-content-marketing-manager-miro|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@U01L7S9J4KE>)
have a great weekend!
jimmy

attachments.fallback: [November 12th, 2021 10:00 AM] runjimdaly: <!here> welcome to our AMA with the ConvertKit content team! <@U02GURRRZE0> (<https://www.linkedin.com/in/itsangelmarie/>) and <@U02H58CTZ41> (<https://www.linkedin.com/in/danileighstewart/>) are here to chat with us about storytelling, lead gen, marketing to creators, ebooks, podcasts & video, and more. <@U02GURRRZE0> was kind enough to also give me a demo of convertkit, <https://superpath.co/blog/convertkit-for-content-marketers-and-freelance-writers-a-quick-start-guide|which you can check out here>. okay, let's do this!
